Text: This is without doubt the funniest of the episodes so far. Let's pray for more, either before or after the 'real' event if such an event involves reality.
What I find so funny is that the PR woman, Siobhan, is so like 'real' PR women, if 'real' is the correct word to describe these particular creatures. Brilliantly observed, and great acting.
Thanks so much for uploading this wonderful series, a rare opportunity to enjoy British comedy at its best, Phil.
Nice one, wwwphil, thanks for this. Nice to feel appreciated!
The first series, from last year, is widely available on here, by the way. That one had six parts.
